title: Akali is broken
body: i recently versed an akali who was healing over 800 damage a hit because of her life steal and spell vamp THIS IS BULLSHIT i was chogath i ulted her for around 800 TRUE damage and she gained all that health back instantly HOW THE FUCK IS THIS ALLOWED

replies.body: get something with grievous wounds, or ignite

**>**Not using your silence to stop her from vamping
**>**Not saving that 800 dmg for when she is below 800 health
**>**Being this retarded

Akali is garbage you just get some true vision and then wait for team fights to come around pink her shroud and get 300 free gold
i did silence her and i did save my ult for the rare times she did get low the cho,gath ult killing symbol even appeared on her when i did it
How is dealing 800 true damage allowed tbh? thats the real issue here.
